g.text: Agreeing the terms of a payment in an IIPS
I will charge 1 XXX to make this payment
Fees will be borne by the creditor institution
Fees will be borne by the creditor institution
I will charge 1.5 XXX for this payment
Here is the cryptographic lock for these agreed terms:
These terms are valid for the next 5 minutes
The payment will go to Ingeborg Bachmann
Your account will be debited 100 XXX
Your beneficiary's account will be credited 97.5 XXX
Please use your PIN to confirm
that you would like to make the payment.
I want to execute this payment.
Here is the cryptographic lock for these agreed terms:
Did this request come from the debtor party?
Yes, it did: so I can trust that good funds
have been reserved to cover this payment.
I will credit the beneficiary's account
Does the cryptographic key fit the lock?
Convert the reservation into an obligation
Does the cryptographic key fit the lock?
